name: Galaxy A54
cameraPros: “A54 camera is 70% as good as the S23 Ultra camera for most normal photos, which is pretty good” ~ MKBHD, Apr. 2023
“The A54 gives well-balanced pictures even in the face of bright lighting” ~ Tech Spurt, Apr. 2023
cameraCons: “It really struggles with night time photos” ~ Sakitech, Apr. 2023
“Maybe a little bit blue with the white balance…a little bit over overexposed” ~ MKBHD, Apr. 2023
“I am not impressed with the camera system. The ultrawide and macro camera simply do not take that great photos” ~ Sakitech, Apr. 2023
pros: Up to 1 TB expandable MicroSD card support
Guaranteed 4 OS updates and 5yrs of security updates
“A phone you can upgrade from your older smartphone and take your SD card with you” ~ Sakitech, Apr. 2023
Same battery as the S23 Ultra (5000 mAh). “Good battery life is guaranteed [with the A54]” ~ Sakitech, Apr. 2023
cons: There is some lag/stutter in the performance (10-15% of the time)
Only the phone and cable come ITB (”if you’re targeting people in the budget range at least include the basic accessories in a phone” ~ Sakitech)
